name: Gabe

projects.title: GiveMore, an online donation platform and record-keeping system

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Do you need a competent backend developer for your website or app project? Look no further! As a recent graduate specialized in backend web development, I provide personalized solutions to help you improve your online presence. From database management to scripting server-side functionality, I'll collaborate with you to provide efficient and effective backend solutions. Let's work together to make your digital ideas a reality without any worry.

services.title: Events Hosting
services.description: Do you need help planning an event? As an ambitious event host, I'm here to make your special occasion memorable and stress-free. Whether it's a small meeting or a major celebration, I'll offer energy and organization to make things go well. Let us collaborate to create an outstanding experience for you and your visitors, from engaging your guests to regulating the event flow. Sit back, relax, and leave the hosting to me!

services.title: Software Quality Assurance
services.description: Launching a new software product or updating an existing one? Ensure its reliability and performance with thorough software testing and quality assurance. As a recent graduate with a passion for ensuring seamless user experiences, I am willing to meticulously test applications to identify and resolve issues before they impact your users. From functionality testing to user acceptance testing, I'll collaborate with your team to deliver a polished product that meets the highest standards of quality. Let's work together to elevate your software to the next level.

aboutpara: I am a motivated information systems student currently working as a backend developer intern at Gallium31 in order to gain hands-on experience. I am willing to listen, learn, and contribute in a real-world environment to help find practical, actionable solutions for current needs. I can offer skills in written and verbal communication and multitasking. Additionally, while my title is that of a backend developer intern, I am able to take on full-stack roles as well.

resume.description: I am a motivated information systems student currently undergoing a full-stack development internship at Gallium31.

experiences.position: Fullstack Developer of our final capstone project GiveMore
experiences.bullets: Developed and maintained front-end web applications using ReactJS/Next.JS, and PostgreSQL, Conducted troubleshooting and debugging of code issues to identify root causes, Assessed code during the testing stage to determine potential glitches and bugs, Managed both back-end and front-end aspects of the development process

experiences.position: President of the Association of Information Management
experiences.bullets: Served as one of the founding members of a cluster/union of student organizations under De La Salle-College of Saint Benilde, Collaborated with staff members to ensure the operational efficiency of the organization, Coordinated work across departments to keep teams on track with organizational goals, Attended college-provided leadership trainings

experiences.position: Programs Committee Head of the Association of Information Management
experiences.bullets: Ensured the smooth flow of the events of the Association of Information Management, Created contingency plans for different events, Consistently served as the host/emcee for most if not all of the events held between 2020-2023

education.universityName: De La Salle-College of Saint Benilde
education.universityPara: I submitted my thesis entitled "GiveMore: An Online Donation Platform and Record-keeping System" aimed at enhancing the resource acquisition processes of charity organizations. I am majoring in Information Systems and have received the Brother President Scholarship Grant (BPSG). Additionally, I am a member of the Association of Information Management (AIM), and have served as the organization president for the year of 2023.
